tool_description: Creates bass lines that follow chord progressions with appropriate walking patterns and rhythmic variations.

style.description: Bass style: walking, driving, melodic, rhythmic, syncopated

error_messages: Empty chord progression: Provide at least one chord
Invalid bass style: Choose walking, driving, melodic, rhythmic, or syncopated
Invalid key format: Use standard notation
usage: Provide chord progression, key, and bass style, optionally specify octave. Returns bass note sequence with timing information.

bass_notes.description: Bass note sequence with octave numbers

start_times.description: Start time for each note in beats
